trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Zawiera style obramowania komórek w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> Kontroli służy do pełnego dostosowania jego wyglądu, w tym obramowań komórek i nagłówków.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> Ma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> właściwości, które umożliwiają skonfigurowanie wygląd obramowania komórki.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: Jednak jeśli musisz dostosować obramowania, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> klasy pozwala ustawić styl obramowania na poszczególnych stronach komórki.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> właściwości <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> reprezentują lewo, prawo, górnej i dolnej krawędzi komórki, odpowiednio.

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: Te właściwości można ustawić na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> właściwości <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> do tworzenia różnych wygląd obramowania między komórkami.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adjusts the cell borders of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> so that a double border separates the interior cells and the top left header cell from the row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład kodu dopasowuje obramowania komórki <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> tak, aby podwójne obramowanie oddziela wewnętrznych komórek i górna lewa komórka nagłówka z nagłówków wierszy i kolumn.

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: W tym przykładzie pokazano, jak zastąpić <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> metod i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: These members use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> objects to modify individual cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Użyj tych elementów członkowskich <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> obiektów, aby zmodyfikować granice pojedynczych komórek.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: W poniższym przykładzie przedstawiono użycie tego konstruktora.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Ten przykład jest częścią większego przykładu dostępne w <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> Przegląd klasy.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia styl obramowania dla wszystkich krawędzi komórki.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Jeden z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> wartości.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> właściwości nie są ustawione takie same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> wartość <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> wartość właściwości jest <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Określona wartość, gdy ustawienie dla tej właściwości nie jest prawidłową <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> wartości.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Określona wartość, gdy ustawienie dla tej właściwości jest <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: —lub—

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> and this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> instance was retrieved through the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Określona wartość, gdy ustawienie dla tej właściwości jest <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" />, lub <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> i to <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> wystąpienia został pobrany przy użyciu <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia styl dolnej krawędzi komórki.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Jeden z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> wartości.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> Do porównania.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Określa, czy określony obiekt jest taki sam, jak bieżący <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> and the values for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> properties are equal to their counterpart in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli <paramref name="other" /> jest <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> i wartości dla <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" />, i <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> właściwości są równe ich odpowiednika w bieżącym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Pełni rolę funkcji skrótu dla określonego typu.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy nowy obiekt, który jest kopią bieżącego wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Kopię bieżącego wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją członków.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.ICloneable> interfejsu.

trans-unit.target: Zwraca ciąg reprezentujący <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> Metoda zwraca ciąg, który zawiera wartości dla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> właściwości.
